title: Samsung | SDE-1 PPO | Bengaluru
content:
* Education: Bachelor of Technology, NIT
* Years of Experience: 0 (Campus Hire)
* Prior Experience: None (Fresher)
* For fresh grad, any related Internship/coop experience?  2-Month fixed SDE Intern at Samsung, fixed 1,00,000 stipend.
* For experienced engineer, what's your current and past experience? NA
* Date of the Offer: 28-08-2023
* Company: Samsung R&D Institute Bengaluru
* Title/Level: Engineer-1
* Location: Bengaluru
* Salary: ₹14,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: ₹1,50,000
* Stock bonus: None
* Bonus: ₹60,000 (1.5 x basic) Yearly Diwali, ₹1,40,000 (10% of Base) Yearly Appraisal
* Retention Bonus: ₹1,00,000 Year-1, ₹1,50,000 Year-2, ₹1,50,000 Year-3, ₹1,00,000 Year-4 
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹20,50,000
* Benefits: ₹155 Per Day Meal Allowance, ₹1000 Per Month Mobile Allowance, ₹9000 Per Yearly Diwali Coupon
* Other details: Techstack is Android Developer Java, Kotlin. Pretty cool development work. Stress free environment. Awesome bus connectivity to every corner of city, free and paid both options available. Beautifully themed Floor Pantries, and a Huge Cafeteria with live kitchen all sorts of food from salads to junkies, thali, biriyani and much more everyday :)
